title: Nonexpansive chaotic almost minimal systems on residually finite groups
abstract:
The question of existence of nonexpansive chaotic almost minimal (CAM)
systems, and the existence of CAM systems on every residually finite group,
were raised in a recent paper of Van Cyr, Bryna Kra and Scott Schmieding. We
construct nonexpansive CAM systems on all finitely-generated residually finite
groups.
